title: How to See Your Liked Videos on YouTube

steps.title: Open the YouTube app and sign in.
steps.content: Open the YouTube app and sign in. On your iPhone or Android, tap the YouTube app icon, which has a white "Play" triangle button on a red background. This will open your YouTube home page if you're logged in. The YouTube app is pre-installed on most devices. If you don’t see it, get it from the Apple App Store (iOS) or the Google Play Store (Android).

steps.title: Tap You in the bottom right corner of the screen.
steps.content: Tap You in the bottom right corner of the screen. Doing so will bring up a list of recently watched videos and your playlists. If you’re on the mobile site rather than the app, this button will say Library instead of “You.”

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Liked videos.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Liked videos . This option is below the "Playlists" heading in the middle of the page. Doing so opens a playlist with all of your liked YouTube videos. Your liked videos will appear on this page, starting with the most recently liked one and ending with the oldest available video you liked. You can scroll down through the "Liked videos" page to load more videos.

steps.title: Open YouTube and sign in to your account.
steps.content: Open YouTube and sign in to your account. Go to https://www.youtube.com/ in your computer's web browser. This will open your YouTube home page if logged into your account. If you aren't logged in, click SIGN IN in the upper-right corner of the YouTube page, then enter your email address and password before proceeding.

steps.title: Select You on the left sidebar.
steps.content: Select You on the left sidebar. If your browser window is narrow, you’ll see a limited sidebar, where you can select the You icon with a play button to be taken to your library. If your browser window is wide, you may select Liked videos directly. If you don't see the sidebar, first click ☰ in the upper-left corner of the page.

steps.title: Click View full playlist under your “Liked videos” playlist.
steps.content: Click View full playlist under your “Liked videos” playlist. Find the “Playlists” section near the center of the page. In this section, find the “Liked videos” playlist. Under it, find and select View full playlist to see your liked videos, organized by your most recently liked video. This playlist reportedly maxes out at 5,000 videos and will not display videos you’ve previously liked and then unliked. Or, select View all above the “History” section to see your most recently viewed videos, even if you haven’t liked them.
